title: The Municipal Commissioner / Metropolitan Commissioner / Chief Executive Officer / Chief Officer, before granting development permission, shall verify and satisfy himself in respect of the feasibility of providing basic infrastructure facilities like electricity, water supply, sewerage etc
clause_text: The Municipal Commissioner / Metropolitan Commissioner / Chief Executive Officer / Chief Officer, before granting development permission, shall verify and satisfy himself in respect of the feasibility of providing basic infrastructure facilities like electricity, water supply, sewerage etc. required for the project.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: The Municipal Commissioner / Metropolitan Commissioner / Chief Executive Officer / Chief Officer, before granting development permission, shall verify and satisfy himself in respect of the feasibility
